transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hanji sir bataiye.
Customer: Teen din mein sir aapke account mein aaya nahi.
Executive: Ye by lead chahiye kuch batana nahi hai.
Executive: Sir, toh 100 by lead aapko kaun kahi written mein koi diya tha ki 100 by lead aapko milegi. 50 by lead ka hume bhi pata hai ki 50 by lead aapko 50 aapne consume kar li hai.
Customer: Wo log toh aap likh ke nahi dete na dusri baar hum likhwa ke lenge.
Executive: Hmm hmm. Theek hai aap agar bol rahe ho aap likhwa ke lenge lijiyega bilkul. Lekin mujhe ye bataiye ki agar aapko dekhiye jaha tak mujhe acche se pata hai ki 50 by lead ki ka hum log yaha pe wo dete hai aur 50 by lead aapko di gayi hai. Aapne wo consume kar li hai wo alag baat hai. Theek hai? Present time mein agar aur by lead aapko chahiye toh aap dekhiye ek kaam kar sakte hai ki by lead ka hamara ek package hota hai usko aap kharid lijiye aapko extra by lead mil jayegi. Jo by lead humne aapko free mein allot ki thi uska ek certain amount hota hai wo aap dijiye aur aapko by lead extra mil jayegi. Ye ho sakta hai sir. Iske liye aap chahe toh p.indiamart pe check bhi kar sakte hai extra by lead kaise kharid sakte hai. Ya phir aap per by lead bhi aap aise kharid sakte hai. Ek by lead ka cost aapko pad jayega 420 ya 430 aise karke. Aapko agar yehi lena hai toh aap ye kar sakte hai. Theek hai sir? Aur rahi baat agar aap bol rahe ho na ki aapko 50 100 by lead ka consume kiya jaha tak maine abhi aapne shayad mere senior se baat ki thi Shubham sir se. Unhe aapne bol rakha hai ki aapko 100 by lead ka promise kiya gaya tha. Sir, main system mein main bhi baitha hu 100 by lead ki koi promise nahi karta 50 ki hui hai 50 aapne use ki hai. Pichle aapke kahi main bata raha hu cheh cheh cheh din ka hota hai apne paas theek hai sir? Cheh din mein se aapne 44 by lead use ki hai. Agar dekhe toh saat din mein apne ko milta hai round off.
Hanji sir.
Customer: Tame je vyakti sathe vaat kari rahya chho, emne tamara call ne hold par rakhyo chhe. Krupya karine line par raho. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, usne aapki call ko hold kar rakha hai. Krupya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line.
Customer: Tame je vyakti sathe vaat kari rahya chho, emne tamara call ne hold par rakhyo chhe. Krupya karine line par raho. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, usne aapki call ko hold kar rakha hai. Krupya line par bane rahe.
Executive: Hanji.
Customer: Hello
Customer: Hello
summary:
Concerns:

- Did not receive promised 100 buyleads.

- Payment not reflected in account after 3 days.



Resolution:

- Explained only 50 buyleads were part of package.

- Suggested buying additional buyleads.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, payment
